name: Email Request
text: 📧 We'd love to stay in touch! Please provide your email address to receive important updates. ✨

name: Feedback
text: 💬 We'd love to hear from you! Please share any feedback or suggestions you have for us. ✨

name: Survey Participation
text: 📊 Help us improve! Please take a moment to fill out this short survey and share your thoughts. ✨

name: Support Inquiry
text: 🛠 Need assistance? Let us know what we can help you with, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. ✨

name: Service Options
text:
🌟 Choose your preferred service level 🌟

Would you prefer a basic setup or a more advanced service? Let us know what works best for you! ✨

name: Appointment Request
text: 📅 Schedule an appointment with us at your convenience! Let us know your preferred date and time. ✨

name: Custom Request
text: 🎨 Have a custom request or need something personalized? Let us know how we can tailor our services to your needs! ✨

name: Follow-Up
text: 📞 Would you like us to follow up? Provide your preferred contact details and we'll get in touch! ✨

name: Product Inquiry
text: 🛒 Have questions about our products or services? Let us know what you'd like to learn more about! ✨

name: General Information
text: ℹ️ Looking for more information? Send us your questions and we'll provide all the details you need. ✨

name: Welcome
text: 🎉 Welcome! We're excited to have you here. Feel free to ask us anything, and let's get started! ✨

name: Thank You
text: 🙏 Thank you for choosing us! If you have any questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. ✨

name: Delivery Confirmation
text: 📦 Your request has been successfully processed! If you have any issues, please let us know. ✨

name: Logo Request
text: 🎨 Looking for a logo design? Provide your company name, niche, and style preference, and we'll help create one for you. ✨
